redirectUrl.description: The URL to redirect users to after they fill the form. Must be a valid URL.
redirectUrl.title: URL to Redirect to

formSubmittedText.description: The text displayed to users after they fill the form. Leave it empty if don't want to show any additional text.
formSubmittedText.title: Text to Show

formNotice.title: In the 'Respond to Webhook' node, select 'Respond With JSON' and set the formSubmittedText key to display a custom response in the form, or the redirectURL key to redirect users to a URL
formNotice.displayName: In the 'Respond to Webhook' node, select 'Respond With JSON' and set the formSubmittedText key to display a custom response in the form, or the redirectURL key to redirect users to a URL

responseMode.description: When to respond to the form submission
responseMode.title: Respond When

formDescription.description: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form.
formDescription.title: Form Description

fieldLabel.description: Label appears above the input field
fieldLabel.title: Field Label

fieldType.description: The type of field to add to the form
fieldType.title: Field Type

multiselect.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list
multiselect.title: Multiple Choice

requiredField.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form
requiredField.title: Required Field

fieldOptions.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown
fieldOptions.title: Field Options

formTitle.description: Shown at the top of the form
formTitle.title: Form Title

path.description: The final segment of the form's URL, both for test and production
path.title: Form Path

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: n8n Form Trigger
init_kwargs.description: Runs the flow when an n8n generated webform is submitted
